documents.document: I drank a whole bottle of wine while talking to @HelenScheuerer and @ClaireABradshaw on Skype and am only just realising the consequences 😘
@ClaireABradshaw @HelenScheuerer NAW you ladies are the best ❤ Perfect way to spend a Friday night 😊
@AlyssaMackay Yay! Thanks for sharing Alyssa ;)
@ClaireABradshaw We're only 1 month in, things are going great! 🐢 Feb is gonna be fab 😊 So proud of you and so excited for this book! xx
So so so so so so excited about @ClaireABradshaw writing new things! <3 Read all about it in her lovely recap 🎉😘… https://t.co/nq4PmrZd8C
@ClaireABradshaw Yay! I loved this recap Claire! Love that you're writing, and love your reading goals! Fun times ahead for Feb ;)
Am currently beta reading @HelenScheuerer's fantasy novel 'Heart of Mist' and I'm absolutely LOVING IT asdfghjklasdfgh #amreading #amexcited
@annaspargoryan Oh I bet! I might start doing this set-up myself... Thanks for the inspiration 😊
@annaspargoryan Wow! Thanks for sharing this!
On starting a book (!) and reading lots of them ;) My latest #writerslife recap is up! https://t.co/EQoW0gRbij #amwritingfantasy #amwriting
@andrea_is_me That's so exciting! Congratulations! 🎉
@LCass_writes @WritersEdit It's one of those words that just works its way into everything isn't it (oh, woops haha) 😜
Write better prose by cutting these 3 things from your writing -> https://t.co/EppLHuN1LG #amwriting #writetip #writingadvice @WritersEdit
I just went to the local grocer and bought a single brown onion. And nothing else. It cost 52c. Cheering.
@EmaTimar This article from @WritersEdit is a really good guide to starting a bujo! https://t.co/auMQSIHivv :)
@laureningram On a picnic for our 5th anniversary (not a surprise as we'd talked about it & I'd picked my own ring the week before lol)
Here's something nice :) My #shortstory 'Buzzing' is available as an ebook here -> https://t.co/iYPi31Qecs @SpinelessWonder #IARTG #writing
@ClaireABradshaw Nawwww you're too sweet 😊😘
Got my Pinterest boards up, my writing playlist on & a glass of wine by my side ;) Ready to write! #amwriting #writerslife #amwritingfantasy
'The Waterfowl Are Drunk!' stirs nostalgia with its authenticity and Australiana beauty -> https://t.co/Hk0opUUmpK @KateListo @WritersEdit
@KirstyIsWriting I knooowww 😍 So many emotions!
@ClaireABradshaw Hahaha you'll be so organised! P.S. please take an insta pic of your adorable teeny bujo, it sounds so darn cute 😍
@ClaireABradshaw My pleasure! Such a great article 🎉
I finished book 1 of #Outlander but now I'm so in love with Outlander that if I start thinking about Outlander I want to curl up in a ball.
If you're a #writer who loves #bujo, check out this article by @ClaireABradshaw via @WritersEdit for in-depth tips! https://t.co/JEfawIDvwP
Adding songs from the Outlander soundtrack to my writing playlist was the WORST decision. I hear two seconds of pan flute and I want to cry.
My Latest #WritersLife Recap Looks At How Things Have Changed In The Last Year... (Things Have Changed A LOT!) :D https://t.co/EQoW0gRbij
Heading back to work and leaving the long weekend behind :( It was so nice to write, read and recharge! Hope you all had a fab time too <3
Summer days, driftin' away! Sun + beautiful books on #writing from @WritersEdit :) #writerslife #amreading #summer https://t.co/qrEMp8c66P
ICYMI here's last week's #ManuscriptMonday video discussing my WIP! https://t.co/6ilqIqA1rq #SFF #amwritingfantasy… https://t.co/H73vbkR8O2
Off to #bookclub tonight! We're discussing Poe's short story 'The Tell-Tale Heart' which should be really interesting! #bookworm #amreading
Quiet reminder that I have an #authortube / #booktube channel! Am new but *really* enjoying it! Link -> https://t.co/uS14c8rLAp
Huge congratulations to @WritersEdit for being named a winner in the Best #Writing Blogs For Writers Award for 2017! https://t.co/714jNO2K5S
@ClaireABradshaw Aw no! Dads always know what to do ;)
Some advice on the work-life-writing balance and how to keep feeling creative despite your day job -> https://t.co/ctVi59TbTj #writerslife
Drafting my monthly #writerslife recap for my blog & realising that Jan was a pretty fab month for my goals, if nothing else! How about you?
@miladyronel @WritersEdit Thanks for sharing Ronel! 😊
Is anyone else excited about the new adaptation of @MargaretAtwood's #TheHandmaidsTale?! It looks SO GOOD! I want t… https://t.co/XW9xZ9wqgM
Just hit my goal of 1000 words for today! WIP is now over 61k :) Feeling good about where this is all heading! #amwriting #amwritingfantasy
@ClaireABradshaw Hahaha it was such a great writing session! 📝👌 Shall do it again soon 😊💕🎉
Was really struggling to write today, but just finished a #wordsprint with @ClaireABradshaw and wrote 588 words! YA… https://t.co/ADZ3Dg3M2w
@ClaireABradshaw Good plan! ;) *scrolls all the things*
@ClaireABradshaw Hahaha ohhh it's dangerous :D Catch you later for a super productive writing sesh?
Getting up early to do some writing but getting sucked down the social media wormhole instead #writerslife #amnotwriting
Okay I'm bookmarking this one for future reference! Might need to split my WIP into more books :| Eep! https://t.co/m3Plp4b2bf #amwriting
Check out my #ManuscriptMonday vid for super secret (but now not secret at all) info about my WIP! https://t.co/6ilqIqA1rq #writerslife #WIP
I'm so glad I read this book... 'Two Sisters' by @MagabalaBooks is such a gift. #BookReview here -> https://t.co/ambuxYFwit
Was so happy to have a poem published by @VerityLa last year! :D Never in my wildest dreams... https://t.co/VLOgQncYIu #writerslife #poetry
I defs kept this in mind when outlining my WIP! Awesome #writingadvice from @ClaireABradshaw via @WritersEdit -> https://t.co/fvq9vvgz5T
Thinking about cutting a character from my WIP. I've never really felt attached to them & I struggle to fit them into scenes :\ #amwriting
"I adjusted the ventilator so you could breathe easier..." Still in love with this #shortstory in @seizureonline <3 https://t.co/3VlYvjvJnt
I'm currently reading The Bad Beginning in #ASeriesOfUnfortunateEvents and I'd forgotten how FUN these books are! Loving them :) #amreading
Love this advice! I use Pinterest for character development and it's super helpful to have a visual aid!… https://t.co/ndtmlAlRhJ
Excited to jump back into these #shortstories from Aus author @KateListo! Get a copy via @booktopia here ->… https://t.co/KW26n28Dqe
Getting my #writerslife organised today! Lots of planning and deadlines and spreadsheets and just maybe a beer or two ;)
@HelenScheuerer So freaking excited to read this book! I read the prologue & had to stop myself before I got swept away with it too soon 😊💕
Finally finished Chapter 16! It just went on for WAY too long. Feels so good to move on to the next plot point :)… https://t.co/J7IAue9cis
@ClaireABradshaw My pleasure! 😊❤
@spacebarge Ah yes! Everyone that knows I'm reading it is waiting for me to get to *that * part (all I know is it's bad & I'm concerned lol)
Inspirational new stuff from @ClaireABradshaw! Lessons I've learned from this beautiful post: take care, work hard,… https://t.co/kCDNfwFEKd
@spacebarge Haven't watched the TV show yet (reading at least the first book before I do) but I'm really enjoying the historical romance! :D
I just remembered that we have a house inspection tomorrow and have done zero preparation YAY 🙃
It's been one of those Mondays where all I wanted, all day, was to hop on the train home to keep reading Outlander ❤ #amreading #bookworm
@HelenScheuerer @ClaireABradshaw Perfect way to spend a chill Sunday night 💕 Love you ladies!
Doing some writing & this chapter is going on foreverrrrr. Only 300+ words into today's #amwriting sesh & trying to #wordsprint through it!
Soo #amreading Outlander and I'm now 24% through but still have 11 hours 57 minutes til the end. Not overwhelming at all :\

I did the #authortube newbie tag! Fun questions about my writing 😊 Check out my video here: https://t.co/BLUFDfEdfv
#booktube #writerslife
@Writer_CH I used to read while on the exercise bike too! Helps me tune out. It's a neat trick! But reading in my armchair is the best 😊
Does anyone else read books while doing really random things? (I read while on the treadmill) 🙃 #amreading #bookworm
Working from home during a heatwave is not pleasant. But at least I can have a beer :)
@ClaireABradshaw @HelenScheuerer Hahaha I just rewatched that scene and it is so spot on 😂
I love showing @HelenScheuerer & @ClaireABradshaw my latest writerly projects! :) Gives me such a boost! Best frien… https://t.co/Ih3FeepkeG
Screaming the lyrics to Ohio is for Lovers by Hawthorne Heights while carefully holding a cup of tea 🙃
@wandrlstywriter I draw them by hand and they're pretty terrible :D But they're enough for me to visualise & they're super helpful :)
@HelenScheuerer I love this! I want a whole shelf of books by Helen Scheuerer ;)
@LCass_writes Ooh, yes! That's a good one too :)

Pre-dawn sounds I love: 1. Computer whirring 2. Kettle boiling 3. Owls hooting 4. Fast typing
#writerslife #amwriting #5amwritersclub
@theherringlass Oh! Wonderful! Thanks Michelle :D Am still very new at videos, so it's lovely to hear encouragement from authors I admire :)
@theherringlass You're so welcome, Michelle! Letter to Pessoa is a beautiful book xx Thanks for sharing my video 😊💕
.P.S. To check out @jenvcampbell's writing workshops (which also include poetry ones that look amazing), go here -> https://t.co/PPwKHokfV9
So excited! Just signed up for a short story workshop with @jenvcampbell! Can't wait to learn all about fairytale retellings 😊🎉 #writerslife
Quick self-promo tweet! If you follow me on Twitter, I would be so chuffed if you 'liked' my official Facebook page too! Link in profile 😊💕
@HelenScheuerer Hahaha oh I love that 😂
@HelenScheuerer Oooohhhh 😊😊😊 Thanks love x https://t.co/GF3cijitlW
@HelenScheuerer Omg Helen, we ate 1.5 bags of gems... I am 90% potato now. Worth it.
@HelenScheuerer I'm just so excited about how excited you are :D This book better live up to your expectations lol no pressure...
@ClaireABradshaw That's it! Best love is potato love ❤ https://t.co/rV5U68NFdU
@path_ethic Haha, that's it! 😄 I'll probably have to do the same! Good luck to you 😊 Happy writing 🎉
@path_ethic Absolutely! There are always ups & downs. I'm hoping this weekend will have plenty of ups (and story writing!) for both of us 😊
@path_ethic I am *exactly* the same! Been craving time to write my book but have been working my day job (where I write all day). Not easy!
@path_ethic Sounds great! Will you be getting some writing done? :)
@path_ethic He sure does have great ideas sometimes 😉 Wishing you a lovely weekend also 😊🎉💕
I've had a hard day but my husband and I have agreed to just eat a bag of potato gems for dinner so it's not all bad 😊
Me, every time @HelenScheuerer asks me how my WIP is going... #writerslife #amwritingfantasy https://t.co/YNKpwiAh8v
It's one of those days where I need some creative time. Off to work, but would rather be working on my WIP (in a blanket with a pot of tea).
@HelenScheuerer You're most welcome 😊 Keen to get home and get to work on my own writing now! Feeling good about this year 😀🎉📚💕
So many fantastic writing lessons in this post! Such an inspirational read ❤ #writerslife https://t.co/zxPYWWyEBm
@elissablake @sianprior @richardthewatts Haha thanks for the update Elissa! I hope deleting the apps works for you! ;)
Holidays messed up my sleeping pattern so I started reading Outlander & now I only have 5 hrs before I get up for work & still can't sleep 🙃
December #writerslife blog! Featuring my WIP 'The Crossing', 2017 goals, & HUGE news which is sad & also exciting... https://t.co/EbeY62YPPn
